title: Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore: Operating Hours & Seasons
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Operating Hours & Seasons              Operating Hours & Seasons       Unless otherwise posted or noted below, all public use areas are open from sunrise to 30 minutes past sunset.        National Lakeshore Visitor Center   Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore Visitor Center 1215 North Indiana State Road 49 Porter, IN 46304 (219) 395-1882  Open Everyday. 8:00 a.m. - 6:00 p.m. (Memorial Day weekend - Labor Day weekend). 8:30 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. (Winter months). Closed for Thanksgiving, Christmas and New Year's Day holidays.  Learn more...           Park Headquarters   Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore Headquarters 1100 North Mineral Springs Road Porter, IN 46304 (219) 395-1772  Open Monday - Friday. 8:00 a.m. - 4:30 p.m. Closed for Federal Holidays.               Bath House   West Beach Bath House 376 North County Line Road Gary, IN 46403  Open Memorial Day weekend - Labor Day weekend. 8:00 a.m. - 30 minutes past sunset.  West Beach Expanded Amenity Fee  Collected Friday of Memorial Day weekend through Monday of Labor Day weekend. $6.00 per vehicle and motorcycle per day, $30.00 per bus per day. 50% discount for Senior and Access Passes. Cash, U.S. checks or credit, debit and gift cards (MasterCard, Visa and Discover) accepted.   Learn more...         Registration Building   Dunewood Campground 645 Broadway Avenue Beverly Shores, IN 46301 (219) 395-1882  2016 season: April 1 - October 31. First come, first served. No advance reservations. $18.00 per night camping fee (expanded amenity fee). 50% discount for Senior and Access Passes. Credit, debit and gift cards (MasterCard, Visa and Discover) accepted. Automated on-site registration and payment system (kiosk at registration building). No electrical or water hook-ups. Allowed to stay 14 nights per 30 day period.  Learn More...         Paul H. Douglas Center   Paul H. Douglas Center for Environmental Education 100 N Lake Street Gary, IN 46403 (219) 395-1821  Open Everyday, Memorial Day weekend - Labor Day weekend. 9:00 a.m. - 5:00 p.m. Open Monday - Saturday, closed Sundays in the winter. 9:00 a.m. - 4:00 p.m.  Learn more...         Portage Lakefront Pavilion   Portage Lakefront and Riverwalk Pavilion  1000 Riverwalk Drive Portage, IN 46368  Open Everyday. 8 a.m. - 30 minutes past sunset. For more information about public programs offered here, please contact the Portage Parks and Recreation Department at (219) 762-1675 ext. 301 or the National Park Service at (219) 395-1644.  Learn more...         Cowles Lodge   Dunes Learning Center 700 Howe Road Chesterton, IN 46304 (219) 395-9555   Nonprofit National Park Service education partner offering year-round environmental education programs at their residential Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore campus, as well as sites in and around the park.   Works with schools, youth groups, families and the National Park Service to immerse kids in the nature and culture of Indiana Dunes National Lakeshore.   Summer camps for ages 6 to 17 are offered.   Open weekdays. Additional hours as indicated at www.duneslearningcenter.org.  Located at the site of the historic Good Fellow Youth Camp.  Learn more...
